Outdoor Essentials Articles


The Joys of Lake and River Kayaking in Erie County, Pa

Kayaking is a popular water sport that allows you to explore the beauty of rivers, lakes, and coastal waters while also providing a great workout.updated 01/15/2023

The Joys of Riding a Bicycle in Erie County, Pa .

Erie County, Pennsylvania is a fantastic place for cycling enthusiasts, and Presque Isle is a particularly popular destination. updated 01/15/2023

The Joys of Hiking in Erie County, Pa

Erie County offers a diverse range of hiking experiences for outdoor enthusiasts of all skill levels. Here are some of the popular hiking destinations in the county updated 01/15/2023

About the Erie Outing Club

Erie Outdoors Club, a social group For adults who love to roam We venture out, rain or shine To explore and call it home We hike and camp, and paddle too Along the rivers and the streams We cycle through the winding paths And chase our dreams In winter's cold, we ski and snowshoe But we don't mind the frosty air For in the great outdoors, we find A sense of peace, beyond compare We are a club that's non-competitive We come together, hand in hand To share the joys of nature's beauty And make new friends across the land So come and join us on our journeys In Erie, PA, and far beyond We'll explore the world and all it has to offer And make memories, forever fond

This groups.io site is the communication system for members of the club.

For more information and or to join the club, click on this link .
